item.title: Mister Miracle (2017 - 2019)
item.description: Mister Miracle (2017 - 2019). Tom King. Credits: dc.com Mister Miracle Vol. 4 (2017 - 2019). Tom King; Mitch Gerads. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . dc.fandom.com . Accessed Mar 13, 2023. There’s something that I’m missing. I don’t get the ending. Is Scott dead? Snapshots But though our great hero now occupies a seat of comfort and tranquility… Mister Miracle never forgets that somewhere out there… Darkseid is.
